vocabulary.reading: こうぎょう/さんぎょう

vocabulary.meaning: to feel sad / to feed down
to do one's best / to work hard
to take something out / to be caught
to be arrested / to be caught
to move (to another place to live)
to go to pick up someone
to insert / to put something in
to be audible / to be heard
to look up / to look into
to be visible / to be seen

vocabulary.reading: びっくりするおどろく

vocabulary.word: 用意する/準備する/支度する
vocabulary.reading: よういする/じゅんびする/したくする
